p: BHK21, Vero, 293T, Huh7, and U-251 MG cells were cultured in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM, Biological Industries, Israel) with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS, Biological Industries, Beit HaEmek, Israel) and maintained at 37 °C with 5% CO 2. The C6/36 cell was grown in DMEM containing 10% FBS at 28 °C with 5% CO 2.
